Package utilities.eval

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CorpusDepot
    Class used in Evaluation to evaluate a LanguageModel parallelized with a corpus.
    CorpusEvaluator
    Calculates the probability of a corpus line retrieved from CorpusDepot, s.t. the perplexity of LanguageModel can be computed in parallel by Evaluation.
    CorpusReader
    Class to read a line from a corpus and add it to the stack of CorpusDepot.
    Evaluation
    Class that calculates the perplexity of a LanguageModel with a corpus.
